name: New Media Gateway
overview: New Media Gateway, Inc., through its subsidiaries, provides Web-based enterprise marketing solutions. The companyâ€™s marketing software products include digital marketing center with email marketing center, on-demand printing, marketing asset manager, form and survey center, contact management, micro site generator, and presentation generator modules; and Web content management with file management center, dynamic site navigation, site template manager, image library, category management, widget library, blog, event calendar manager, and opt-in manager modules. Its marketing software products also include relationship management with CRM engine sales management AD HOC reporting, employee manager, partner management, orders and inventory, and data migration modules; and workflow management with file management center, approval management, directory management, internal communications, service assignment tool, and campaign creation center modules. The companyâ€™s marketing services include search engine marketing, marketing analytics, creative design, email marketing, e-catalogue/e-brochure, custom development, CD/DVD development, print fulfillment, and enterprise hosting. It also designs, creates, manufactures, and delivers print materials, such as CD business cards, replications, ticket CDs, traditional recordable media, and custom-shaped CDs and DVDs. The company serves agency, franchise, financial, energy, healthcare, insurance, non profit, technology, and real estate industries; and hospitality industry customers, such as convention and visitor bureaus, convention centers, hotels, resorts, casinos, state tourism boards, chambers of commerce, arenas and facilities, and associations. New Media Gateway, Inc. was founded in 1998 and is based in Dallas, Texas.
